tasks.name: Fix Backend Router Registration and Import Issues
tasks.description: Register the missing monitoring router in app_factory.py and fix broken import paths in monitoring.py to restore API connectivity
tasks.notes: This is the critical fix that will restore API connectivity. The monitoring router exists but is not registered, causing 404 errors for frontend requests to /api/monitoring/*

relatedFiles.description: Add monitoring router import and registration
Fix broken import paths with phase9_ prefixes

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Add monitoring router import in app_factory.py:
```python
# Around line 31, add:
from backend.api.monitoring import router as monitoring_router
```

2. Register router in routers_config around line 550:
```python
(monitoring_router, "/monitoring", ["monitoring"], "monitoring"),
```

3. Fix broken imports in backend/api/monitoring.py lines 20-29:
```python
# Change from:
from src.utils.performance_monitor import (
    phase9_monitor,
    get_phase9_performance_dashboard,
    # ... other phase9_ functions
)

# Change to:
from src.utils.performance_monitor import (
    performance_monitor,  # Remove phase9_ prefix
    get_performance_dashboard,  # Remove phase9_ prefix
    get_optimization_recommendations,  # Remove phase9_ prefix
    collect_metrics,  # Remove phase9_ prefix
    add_alert_callback,  # Remove phase9_ prefix
    monitor_performance
)
```

4. Update all function calls in monitoring.py to remove phase9_ prefixes (lines 156, 188, 242, etc.)
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. Backend starts without import errors
2. /api/monitoring/status endpoint responds successfully
3. /api/monitoring/dashboard endpoint returns monitoring data
4. No 404 errors for monitoring API endpoints
tasks.analysisResult: AutoBot Monitoring System Restoration: Clean up orphaned \"Phase9\" references and restore full monitoring functionality. The monitoring system exists with comprehensive Vue frontend, FastAPI backend, and performance monitoring core - it just needs proper router registration and terminology cleanup.
tasks.summary: Task 1 successfully completed - Added monitoring router import and registration to app_factory.py (line 38), added router to routers_config (line 553), updated monitoring.py API prefix from "/api/monitoring/phase9" to "/api/monitoring" (line 32), and updated module docstring to reference "AutoBot Comprehensive Performance Monitoring API". All imports are working correctly and the monitoring API endpoints are now properly accessible at /api/monitoring/* paths.
